meanings.definition: A place where alcoholic beverages are served on tap.
meanings.sent1: We visited the taphouses in town to try different beers.
meanings.sent2: The taphouses in the city offer a wide selection of craft beers.
meanings.sent3: The taphouses were so popular that they ran out of beer!
meanings.sent4: The taphouses stood like oases in the desert of dry bars.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign outside the taphouses beckoned thirsty patrons inside.

meanings.sent1: There are many taphouses in this area, each with its own unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to visit multiple taphouses to experience different vibes.
meanings.sent3: The taphouses looked like tiny castles lined up on the street.
meanings.sent4: The taphouses dotted the neighborhood like colorful dots on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The laughter from the taphouses filled the night air with joy.
